LanguageData.RoyalFavorRewardDesc: Factions can reward you with Royal Favors
LanguageData.GoodwillRewardDesc: Factions can reward you with Goodwill
LanguageData.AutoExpandHomeAreaDesc: Home area will automatically expand around new constructions.
LanguageData.AutoRebuildDesc: Destroyed structures in the home area will be set to be rebuilt.
LanguageData.ShowZoneDesc: Display zones such as stockpiles, growzones.
LanguageData.OutfitsDesc: Set default hitpoints for all outfits.
LanguageData.DefaultMedicineSettingsDesc: Chose the default medical settings for each pawn categories
